rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {3413, 3860, 3973, M4008, M6013}

description: This unit will provide participants with the theoretical and practical knowledge and skills related to working within a range of simulation environments. It will introduce participants to the practical strategies related to planning, designing and delivering simulation-based learning. The unit includes clinical skills, simulation scenario development and designing simulation activities.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
